name: Floxypay
description: What is the project about? All in one crypto platform. What makes your project unique? Floxypay's all-in-one platform offers a decentralized wallet, crypto payment gateway, and a forthcoming cryptocurrency exchange featuring spot, future, and margin trading. With FXY at its core, Floxypay ensures seamless accessibility, security, and functionality across all its services.Floxypay, a crypto platform designed to facilitate cryptocurrency exchange, crypto wallet management, and seamless integration with the travel industry for hotel and flight bookings using cryptocurrencies. FXY Token is an ERC20 token built on the Polygon blockchain, serving as the backbone of the Floxypay platform. Holding and utilizing FXY tokens unlocks a range of exciting benefits, creating a rewarding experience for the platform users. History of your project. Whatâ€™s next for your project?
